name: Zodvoh Vs. Mevil Bodyhorror
description:
Game Synopsis for Zodvoh Vs. Mevil Bodyhorror

Help Zodvoh find the 6 hidden beans, and give that purple beanhead the ol' one-two!

But watch out! Don't lose all your lives, because...

...well, you'll find out soon enough.

Mevil's 6 special beans are hidden randomly, and all of them are never in the same place twice.

Can you face your fears and show Mevil what you're made of?

Features

-Encourages multiple playthroughs with random bean locations

-3 different soundtracks you can choose to play with in levels

-Both good and bad endings

-Secrets and more!

Controls

w - up, hop out of water, climb

a - left

s - down, crouch

d - right, bounce dive (in air)

shift key - select (on menu), jump, wall jump

/ ? key - cyclone axe kick

p - pause game

f2 - soft reset

**This game contains stylized gore and tastefully disturbing content.**
